content: introducing the gentle embrace preemie blanket crochet pattern a heartfelt project designed with beginner-friendly stitches to create a textured cozy blanket perfect for premature babies this pattern is ideal for crocheters looking to make a meaningful contribution by donating to nicus or providing a comforting gift to families with preemies with clear instructions and a lovely design the gentle embrace preemie blanket is a wonderful way to use your crochet skills to spread warmth and love where it s needed most this pattern is also available for free on my blog the premium pdf also includes written instructions a pattern chart and photo tutorial for the border stitches dimensions approximately 17 5 x 19 44 5 cm x 48 3 cm materials needed size 4 worsted weight yarn such as lion brand basic anti-pilling h-8 5mm hook scissors yarn needle gauge not important for this pattern all of my patterns are tested by experienced pattern testers to ensure the pattern is easy to follow they are professionally edited to minimize errors and ensure the wording is consistent with industry standards making it easy for you to read become a remington lane crochet vip subscribe to our newsletter today https //remingtonlane com/subscribe 1 due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns once they have been downloaded however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make let s connect follow remington lane crochet on your favorite platform share your projects using
